text: Mesophelliopsis is a genus of fungi in the order Agaricales. It is incertae sedis with respect to familial placement within the order. The genus is monotypic, containing the single species Mesophelliopsis pernambucensis, found in Brazil. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Agaricales incertae sedis Category:Fungi described in 1957 Category:Fungi of South America Category:Monotypic Agaricales genera
title: Mesophelliopsis
